set_name: Supreme Power of the Golden Spell

name: Apollo
effect: [In Play] Your opponent must show the open pages of their Spell Book. Mamodo: Rops
"Rops, let's become king."

name: Are You OK?
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, select 1 PARTNER card in your Discard Pile and attach it to your appropriate MAMODO card. Discard the Partner card at the END PHASE of this turn. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: All Mamodo
"Kiyo, are you OK?"

name: Bago {Robber}
effect: [Declare To Use] When your opponent has 8 or more MP, reduce your opponent's MP by 3 to increase your MP by 3. Partner: Fredo
A gluttonous mamodo who stole the Rushka's Sheep

name: Baikal
effect: Reduce the Damage of your opponent's Attack by 2. Mamodo: Nya
It makes Nya's body swell out to reduce the shock of an opponent's attack.

name: Bao Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 4th spell. A dragon-shaped electric shock with extreme destructive power.

name: Baransha {Hunter}
effect: [In Play] Your opponent cannot get more than 2 MP during their START PHASE. Partner: Garza
A mamodo who enjoys hunting and fights with quick movements.

name: Bareido
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, this SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Bago
Shoots innumerable fangs torwards opponent.

name: Baris
effect: This SPELL card can be played even when you don't have a Cut n' Paste MAMODO card in play. Select A Cut n' Paste MAMODO card in any pocket of your Spell Book and put it in play. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Cut N' Paste
Makes scissors & glue turn into the mamodo, Cut n' Paste.

name: Boruk
effect: Flip a coin twice; if you get heads at least once, negate your opponent's Attack. Mamodo: Baransha
If shows an afterimage as a decoy to confuse opponents.

name: Brago {A Regal Presence}
effect: [In Play] When this MAMODO card SACRIFICES or PROTECTS your Spell Book against an Attack of 1 Damage, this MAMODO card doesn't receive Damage or Injury. Partner: Sherry
"You will know how foolish it is to fight me!"

name: Brago {Lofty Ideal}
effect: [In Play] Get 3 MP when this Mamodo cards loses the Battle as an Attacker. Partner: Sherry
"Crying accomplishes nothing."

name: Claydo
effect: Your opponent can neither play SPELL cards nor use effects of their MAMODO cards until your opponent's next END PHASE when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Eshros
Earth catches opponents and immobilizes them.

name: Clayshield
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack when you win the Battle as a Defender. Mamodo: Eshros
Earth swells and becomes a shield which protects the body from opponent's attacks.

name: Combination!
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, add the same number as the Power of 1 of your in-play MAMODO cards (except the MAMODO card the next SPELL card is played for) to the Total Power of the SPELL card you play next. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: All Mamodo
"Then we will use a combination as well!"

name: Come Out!
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, the SPELL card you play next can be selected from the 4 previous pockets of your Spell Book. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: All mamodo
"I don't call it a spell if it doesn't come out right now! Give me the power!"

name: Completed Job
effect: Select 1 of your MAMODO cards in your Discard Pile, and move it back to any empty pocket of your Spell Book.
"I owe you one my boy..."

name: Cut N' Paste {Cutting Off The Space}
effect: [2 MP] Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. The selected MAMODO card can neither SACRIFICE nor PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage during this turn. Partner: Kiichiro
"Give me the magic mirror!"

name: Danny {Combat}
effect: [1 MP] This card may Attack without using a SPELL card (Total Power=6500, Damage=1) [1 MP] This card may Defend without using a SPELL card (Total Power=6500). Partner: Mr. Goldo
"Don't call me Danny Boy!"

name: Dareido
effect: Your opponent cannot Defend during this turn. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Purio
It fires liquid which immobilizes opponents.

name: Dino Rignon
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Rops
Reinforced spell of Rigron, its chains lift up gigantic rocks.

name: Dioga Gravidon
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book and Injure all of your opponent's MAMODO cards when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 5th spell. Tap into your anger to bring out the powers hidden inside the book!

name: Dogurak
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. A MAMODO card Injured by this SPELL card is sent to the Discard Pile. Mamodo: Zoboron
A slow, but highly destructive energy ball.

name: Doruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Baransha
Armors her skin, enabling Baransha to rush opponents.

name: Double - 0 Folgore! Super Spy!
effect: Send 1 of your opponent's in play PARTNER cards to the Discard Pile.
"You fell for me."

name: Dufort
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Negate all the effects that prohibit a player from playing SPELL cards this turn. Mamodo: Zeno
He conceals great hatred behind his cool exterior.

name: Eshros {Elite}
effect: [2 MP] 1 of the SPELL cards with Eshros as its MAMODO name in the 2 previous pockets of your Spell Book can be played for this MAMODO card. Partner: Shin
"I'm the elite among mamodo."

name: Eshros {Hidden True Character}
effect: [In Play] This MAMODO card negates all the effects that targer MAMODO cards. This effect is negated during the next turn a SPELL card is played for this MAMODO card. Partner: Shin
"Let's destroy this city."

name: Fredo
effect: [In Play] Get 2 MP after your opponent plays an EVENT card. Mamodo: Bago
"Ha? Are you going to turn on us?"

name: Friends
effect: Turn all your MAMODO cards to Normal Status. This effect can only be applied when you have 2 or more MAMODO cards in play.
1+1 can be 10... It's real friendship.

name: Fureido
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, increase the Damage of this SPELL card by 1. Mamodo: Bago
A breath of intense flame. Even if its fired onto the ground, it continues burning.

name: Galliont
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Any SPELL card with a "Wind" Attribute can be played for this PARTNER's MAMODO during this turn. Mamodo: Zabas
"Welcome to heaven."

name: Ganzu Poreid
effect: Your opponent cannot use any effects of cards that can be activated by sending them to the Discard Pile until your opponent's next END PHASE. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Cut N' Paste
A mamodo and his partner stick together by the power of the paste!

name: Gar Redoruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When your opponent doesn't Defend this SPELL card, add 1 Damage to this SPELL card. Mamodo: Wonrei
Makes Wonrei fly up in the air and perform a spinning kick.

name: Garuk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zabas
Wings of Armor protect the body, then rush at opponent.

name: Garza
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Your opponent cannot get any MP during their next turn. Mamodo: Baransha
"Weaken your prey and strike!"

name: Gigano Bireido
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Bago
It fires a beam of intense heat.

name: Gigano Gadoruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Baransha
"Take this! Baransha's final attack!"

name: Go Boren
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. If your MAMODO card inflicts Damage, send 1 of your opponent's cards in the open pages of their Spell Book to the Discard Pile. Mamodo: Wonrei
"Byakou Koso" Claws of a hero defeat the evil dragon!

name: Go Redoruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. During the Battle you play this SPELL card, negate all the effects of PARTNER and EVENT cards. Mamodo: Wonrei
It reinforces Wonrei's leg power.

name: Grancrag
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. After the Battle (whether you won or lost), flip a coin; if it's heads, your opponent cannot play any SPELL cards during this turn. Mamodo: Eshros
It causes an explosion which is powerful enough to turn the ground to powder.

name: Grandbao
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker or a Defender. Mamodo: Eshros
It blows opponents off the ground with a blast.

name: Grandsen
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you declare the play of thie SPELL card, you can add 2000 Power and 1 Damage to the card each time you reduce your MP by 2 (maximum 6 MP). Mamodo: Eshros
It bombards opponents with rocks shot from an earthen cannon.

name: Groundam
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Eshros
It squashes opponents from both right and left with a ground wall.

name: Groundbai
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Negate all EVENT cards during the Battle this SPELL card is played. Mamodo: Eshros
Summons a huge ground snake to attack opponents.

name: Groundgarudo
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, Injure 1 of you opponent's MAMODO cards as well. Mamodo: Eshros
A sharp lump of stone which pushes up from the ground and attacks opponents.

name: Gu Riaruk
effect: The MAMODO card this SPELL card is played for can neither be Damaged nor be target of your opponent's card effects until your opponent's next END PHASE. Mamodo: Baransha
It makes Baransha invisible, enabling her to sneak up behind opponents.

name: Hige
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards (except a Zoboron MAMODO card). That MAMODO card can be used to PROTECT your Spell Book from Damage only once during the Battle. Mamodo: Zoboron
"Finally, we've achieved the best combination!"

name: Jioruk
effect: Turn the MAMODO card this Spell card is played for to Normal Status. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Danny
It heals Danny completely in an instant.

name: Kanchomé {I Love Candy!}
effect: [In Play] Get 1 MP for each time you flip a coin. Partner: Parco Folgore
"Candy? I won't give you any."

name: Kanchomé {Noble Soul}
effect: [In Play] The PARTNER card attached to this MAMODO card cannot be sent to the Discard Pile by your opponent's card effects. Partner: Parco Folgore
"Remember that I promised to always protect you."

name: Kiichiro
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Reduce your opponent's MP by 2 and get 2 MP. Mamodo: Cut N' Paste
On Grisor's order, the plots to steal Zatch's magic mirror.

name: Kiyo Takamine
effect: [In Play] Your MP can neither be reduced by your opponent's card effects nor increased by your card effects during the BATTLE PHASE. You can send this card to the Discard Pile at any time. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
"My desire to make Zatch a King is unrivaled."

name: Kiyo's Summer Vacation
effect: You can play up to 3 EVENT cards (including this card during this turn.
"I promised my friend we'd go out together..."

name: Koporuk
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, Damage your opponent's Spell Book. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Kanchomé
Kanchomé's 2nd spell. "I'll show my true power to you!"

name: Kyadopan
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Nya
Nya's sharp claws slashes.

name: Li-En
effect: [Send THis Card To The Discard Pile] Negate the Damage to this PARTNER's MAMODO card. Mamodo: Wonrei
"I love Wonrei!"

name: Light and Darkness
effect: Both players select 1 of their own MAMODO cards at the END PHASE of this turn. All other MAMODO cards are sent to the Discard Pile.
The look so alike. What is their relationship?

name: Lupa
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. None of your opponent's MAMODO cards except the selected MAMODO card can SACRIFICE or PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage during this turn. Mamodo: Purio
"Hirururururu............"

name: Ma Seshield
effect: Reduce your MP by 2 to add 4000 Power to this SPELL card. Negate your opponent's Attack when you win the Battle as a Defender. Mamodo: Tia
Tia's 3rd spell. It creates a large disk-shaped shield that protects the user.

name: Megumi
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. The selected MAMODO card cannot use any "Attack" Spell cards during this turn. Mamodo: Tia
"We are not fighting alone. We've got friendship on our side!"

name: Mokerudo
effect: Neither player can play any SPELL cards nor use effects of their MAMODO cards until the END PHASE of your next turn. Mamodo: Purio
It blocks the opponent's sight with a huge smokescreen.

name: Mr. Goldo
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] A Jiruk SPELL card in any pocket of your Spell Book can be played for this PARTNER's MAMODO. Mamodo: Danny
"Stupid, Danny Boy!"

name: Nana Baba
effect: Get a number of MP equal to the MP your opponent reduced by card effects this turn.
"My son is Tadashi, his wife is Hiromi."

name: Naomi's Help
effect: All of your MAMODO cards can SACRIFICE or PROTECT your Spell Book from Damage, even if they are prohibited to do so.
"Nuaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!"

name: Nya (TRANSFORMED) {Ribbon Of Bounds}
effect: This card is placed on a regular Nya MAMODO card. [1 MP] Select a Shion PARTNER card of your choice from any pocket of your Spell Book and attach it to this MAMODO card. Partner: Shion
Nya transforms into an aggressive cat mamodo.

name: Nya {Meow}
effect: [2 MP] Select 1 of your opponent's in-play MAMODO cards of your choice. Then, decrease the Power of the selected MAMODO card by 2000. Partner: Shion
Meow~~!

name: Okeru
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker, OR send 1 of your opponent's in-play PARTNER cards to the Discard Pile instead of Damaging your opponent's Spell Book. Mamodo: Baransha
A supersonic wave that emerges from Baransha's mouth!

name: Oru Dogurak
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. A MAMODO card Injured by this SPELL card is send to the Discard Pile. Mamodo: Zoboron
A Reinforced Dogurak, it chases opponents and explodes.

name: Oru Wigar
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, none of your opponent's MAMODO cards can SACRIFICE nor PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage. Mamodo: Zabas
A gust of wind that can be controlled.

name: Paperuk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. The Power of this SPELL card is considered to be the same as the number of MAMODO cards in your Discard Pile times 2000. Mamodo: Cut N' Paste
A piece of paper cut into a human shape becomes real and attacks opponents.

name: Paperuto
effect: Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. Neither the selected MAMODO card nor the Nya MAMODO card this SPELL card is played for can play SPELL cards or use their effects until the END PHASE of your next turn. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Nya
A mamodo wo is under the spell is forced to dance with Nya.

name: Parco Folgore
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Your opponent cannot use their PARTNER cards' effects during their next turn. Mamodo: Kanchomé
"I'm the handsome Italian hero, Parco Folgore!"

name: Peruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin twice; Damage of this SPELL card is considered to be the same as the number of heads you get. Mamodo: Nya
Nya's needle-like hair shoots at opponents.

name: Poreid
effect: Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. Your opponent can neither play any SPELL cards for that MAMODO card, nor apply any SPELL cards for that MAMODO card, nor apply the effects of that MAMODO card during your opponent's next turn. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Purio
It fires a liquid that paralyzes an opponent's body.

name: Poreidoruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. If your MAMODO card inflicts Damage, your opponent cannot play any SPELL cards until your opponent's next END PHASE. MAMODO: Cut N' Paste
It fires glue, immobilizing opponents.

name: Poruk
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, reduce your opponent's MP by 3. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Kanchomé
Kanchomé 1st spell. "I'm the invincible mamodo, Kanchomé!"

name: Praying Mantis Joe
effect: If your MP is reduced by your opponent's card effects during this turn, turn 2 pages of your opponent's Spell Book.
A popular children's TV show hero.

name: Prime Yellowtail
effect: Get 5 MP.
"Dig in Zatch! I'm all yours!"

name: Princess Marie
effect: Put a Tia MAMODO card and a Megumi PARTNER card of your choice from any pocket of your Spell Book in play.
"The pride flowing in my blood cannot be disgraced by anyone!"

name: Purio {A Diffucult Child}
effect: [In Play] Increase the cost of all your opponent's EVENT cards by 1. Partner: Lupa
He likes to make fun of people.

name: Rerudo
effect: When Wonrei SACRIFICES or PROTECTS your Spell Book from Damage, WOnrei cannot receive further Injury. Mamodo: Wonrei
Double palms that capture the wind!

name: Rigron
effect: When used for Attacking, flip a coin; if it's heads, Damage your opponent's Spell Book. When used for Defending, flip a coin; if it's heads, negate your opponent's Attack. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Rops
It manipulates people and things with a rope.

name: Rigrosen
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Rops
It pierces opponents in the distance using many blades attached to ropes.

name: Rin Fureido
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, increase the Damage of this SPELL card by 2. Mamodo: Bago
Rings of fire that are fired one after another.

name: Rops {A King For Freedom}
effect: [In Play] SPELL cards can be played for this MAMODO card and effects of this MAMODO card can be used even when you are prohibited to do so. Partner: Apollo
A mamodo who fights to become a king for freedom.

name: Rushka
effect: Turn a page of your Spell Book to get 3 MP. You cannot play SPELL cards during this turn.
"My brother... I'm so happy."

name: Saisu
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Tia
Tia's 2nd spell. It strikes opponents with a sacred crescent moon-shaped blade.

name: Sherry
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Your MP cannot be reduced by your opponent's card effects during this turn. Mamodo: Brago
"I can't be happy without you."

name: Shin
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Get 2 MP. Add 2000 Power to 1 of the Spell cards this PARTNER's MAMODO plays during this turn. Mamodo: Eshros
"I want to be a strong man!"

name: Shion
effect: [In Play] Your opponent cannot turn back pages of their Spell Book during the BATTLE PHASE. You can send this card to the Discard Pile at any time. Mamodo: Nya
A transfer student to Kiyo's class. What's her story?

name: Shizaruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, add 1 Damage to this SPELL card. Mamodo: Cut N' Paste
The power of his scissors cuts through air.

name: The Most Powerful Mamodo
effect: Your opponent must select 1 of their MAMODO cards. Your opponent can play SPELL cards only for this MAMODO card and use only this MAMODO card's effects during this turn. Only the selected MAMODO can SACRIFICE or PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage during this turn.

name: Tia {Gotta Hurry!}
effect: [Declare To Use] This MAMODO card can use a SPELL card with Tia as its MAMODO name for Defending from any pocket of your Spell Book (except the last page). Then send the used SPELL card to the Discard Pile. Partner: Megumi
"Megumi, hurry up! Everybody is in danger now."

name: Tia {We Are Not Alone}
effect: [Declare To Use] Add 2000 Power to 1 of your MAMODO cards (except this MAMODO card) during this turn. Partner: Megumi
"Don't forget... none of us is alone."

name: Tia's Homemade Dish
effect: Get 4 MP
at the END PHASE of this turn.

name: Volunlun
effect: Remove all effects of cards which have already been playd against you that prohibit you from using MAMODO card effects, playing SPELL cards, performing a SACRIFICE or using a MAMODO card to PROTECT your Spell Book from Damage.
Volunlun was victorious in the fight with Volcan 300.

name: Wife
effect: Look at all the cards in your opponent's Spell Book and Discard Pile, then send 1 card with the same card name as one of the cards in their Discard Pile from their Spell Book to the Discard Pile.

name: Will You Help Me Fight?
effect: Select as many PARTNER cards as you like from any pocket of your Spell Book and attach them to your MAMODO cards. Only 1 PARTNER card can be attached to each MAMODO card.
"Folgore, will you help me fight?" "Why not, Kanchomé?"

name: Wonrei {Protective King}
effect: [1 MP] This MAMODO card can SACRIFICE or PROTECT your Spell Book even when its prohibited to do so. Partner: Li-En
"I won't let you touch Li-En."

name: Zabas {Armored Wing}
effect: [1 MP] Negate 1 of your opponent's Attacks that inflict 1 Damage. Partner: Galliont
"Once a loss, always a loser."

name: Zaker
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 1st spell. "Take this!"

name: Zaker
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zeno
Zeno's 1st spell. Reinforced Zaker which shoots an electric shock from his palm.

name: Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, your opponent can neither SACRIFICE nor PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage. Mamodo: Zatch Bell.
Zatch's 5th spell. Reinforced Zaker, when converged has a greater destructive power.

name: Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When used for Attacking, add 2000 Power to this SPELL card. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 5th spell. "Zatch, focus!"

name: Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Zeno
Zeno's spell. It centralizes an electric shock into one point and shoots it from his palm.

name: Zatch Bell {All Strength}
effect: [Declare To Use] An Attack of this MAMODO cards which has 10000 or more Total Power cannot be defended. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"I'll pursue my goal to be a kind king step by step."

name: Zatch Bell {Iron Will}
effect: [Declare To Use] During the Battle this MAMODO card Attacks, your opponent cannot use the effects of MAMODO cards or PARTNER cards. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"I won't let you win!"

name: Zatch Bell {Shining Body}
effect: This card is placed on a regular Zatch Bell MAMODO card. Discard this MAMODO card at the END PHASE of your next turn (your regular Zatch Bell MAMODO card remains there). This MAMODO card is considered to be a Zatch Bell MAMODO card. [In Play] This MAMODO card doesn't receive Damage or Injury. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"No power can feel as good as this!"

name: Zatch Bell {Unafraid Heart}
effect: [1 MP] The Power of this MAMODO card is equal to 1 of your opponent's in-play MAMODO cards of your choice during this turn. Partner: Kiyo Takamine
"I want to be a kind king! That's the only thing I want to be!"

name: Zeno {Invincible}
effect: This MAMODO card cannot SACRIFICE or PROTECT your Spell Book from Damage. [In Play] This MAMODO card doesn't receive Damage or Injury. Partner: Dufort
"Who mistook me for that idiot?"

name: Zoboron {A Strange Pet}
effect: [2 MP] Select a Hige PARTNER card from any pocket of your Spell Book and attach it to this MAMODO card. Partner: Hige
He is 7 years old, loves fish, and hates bugs.
